scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix client" "npm run dev --prefix server"
scripts.dev:clean: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "foreach ($p in 5000,5173,5174,5175) { $conns = Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort $p -State Listen -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if ($conns) { $conns | Select-Object -ExpandProperty OwningProcess -Unique | ForEach-Object { Stop-Process -Id $_ -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } } }; npm run dev"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server
scripts.vercel-build: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.deploy:netlify: npm run build --prefix client && npx netlify-cli deploy --prod
scripts.deploy:test: npm run build --prefix client && npx netlify-cli deploy
